amendment.description: To propose an alternative to section 1033, relating to a limitation on the transfer or release of individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

action.text: Amendment SA 2175 proposed by Senator Levin.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2175, under the order of 11/19/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 238.
